short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: a solution to flatten all Jira tickets and allow a Gantt chart to plan and monitor the progress

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jira Gantt supports to fetch and flatten all Jira cloud tickets (of Sprints or JQL) via read-only API access and allow users to manually create a gantt chart to plan the tickets locally. Additional, user can export/import the planning information to/from Google Sheet

Applicable case: 
   When you need to have a detail plan for each stories to optimize the performance of a specialized team. For example you have members dedicated for QA, Dev work but not have cross-functional team, thus for a User Story the team would plan the development work and testing work separately.

Detail planning flow:
   Fetch Sprint backlog to this tools as a dashboard
   Export to Google Sheet for all members to input the panning dates
   Import the planning dates from Google Sheet
   The plan dates can be input directly using this tool via UI
